Title: Clinical Data Associate II - South Africa (Remote) - FSP
Description:
Lensa is a career site that helps job seekers find great jobs in the US. We are not a staffing firm or agency. Lensa does not hire directly for these jobs, but promotes jobs on LinkedIn on behalf of its direct clients, recruitment ad agencies, and marketing partners. Lensa partners with DirectEmployers to promote this job for PAREXEL. Clicking "Apply Now" or "Read more" on Lensa redirects you to the job board/employer site. Any information collected there is subject to their terms and privacy notice.

Parexel is currently seeking a Clinical Data Associate II to join us in South Africa, dedicated to a single sponsor.

This role will be responsible for performing Data Management activities that support the sponsor’s commercial and development projects worldwide. The successful candidate will participate as an active member of a multi-disciplinary team to plan and execute the Data Management tasks required for phase I – IV studies. The Clinical Data Associate II has a broad, fundamental knowledge of the data management process and is able to perform most required tasks with moderate guidance.

Working as a Clinical Data Associate II at Parexel FSP offers tremendous long-term job security and prospects. We undertake vital clinical studies for sponsors including the leading global biotechs and Pharma top 50. And we have an incredible pipeline of work.

Expect exciting professional challenges in inspiring studies, but with time for your outside life.

This will be a fully remote home-based position. RAVE experience is strongly preferred.

Responsibilities


Lead a small clinical study or co-lead a larger study or studies with moderate guidance.
Support several clinical studies with minimal guidance.
Manage and monitor the progress of data management activities with CROs or other vendors on assigned studies.
Review protocols for appropriate data capture including electronic Case Report Form (eCRF) design.
Perform a thoroughly detailed review of eCRF data requirements.
Interact with CRAs, programmers, study managers and statisticians in designing eCRFs and creating the annotated eCRF and CRF completion guidelines.
Develop data edit check specifications and run data listings as required.
Coordinate the design and testing of Electronic Data Capture (EDC) systems according to company standards. Able to resolve EDC system issues with team members.
Develop the Data Management Plan for a clinical study.
Able to review and provide feedback to the clinical team on other study documents e.g. Clinical Monitoring plans, Statistical analysis plans and vendor specifications.
Enter data queries into the EDC system to be resolved at investigational sites and manage the resolution of those queries.
Perform reconciliation of header data from external data sources against the clinical database.
Perform Serious Adverse Event reconciliation activities according to SOPs and guidelines.
Assist in database upgrades/migrations including performing User Acceptance Testing.
Able to maintain study workbooks and data management files.
Perform database lock and freeze activities per company SOPs.
Provide input into the development of data management SOPs, Work Instructions, and process documents.


Here are a few requirements specific to this advertised role.


Bachelor’s Degree required (Master's Degree preferred) in the scientific/healthcare field.
At least two years’ experience in Data Management for the pharmaceutical/biotechnology industry.
Understanding of the scope and focus of Phase I – IV clinical studies, and a proven ability to perform some of the core Data Management tasks and interact with vendors.
An understanding of regulatory guidelines and industry standards (e.g., ICH/FDA guidance, CDISC standards, GCDMP, 21 CFR 11, MedDRA, WHO Drug Dictionaries, etc.) and their application to Data Management practice.
Attention to detail and the ability to work individually, within a multi-disciplinary team, as well as with external partners and vendors.
Strong English language written and verbal communication skills.
Able to travel to meetings or training seminars on occasion.
Possesses solid computer system and technical skills with a strong ability to learn multiple computer applications. Prior experience with different Data Management systems and technologies, and Electronic Data Capture systems is desirable.
Experience and understanding of the Oncology or CNS therapeutic area and with Phase III pivotal studies are desirable.


We care about our people and your passion, as they are the key to our success, and provide an open and friendly work environment where we empower people and provide them with opportunities to develop their long-term careers. In addition, you will have the opportunity to develop within your role and tackle further responsibilities or develop your skill set within other related departments of Parexel.

Who Are Parexel

Parexel supports clinical studies across the full range of therapeutic areas, and we have longstanding partnerships with a vast client base.

We supported the trials of most of today’s top 50 best-selling drugs, but equally we enable more niche drug developments that are critical to the well-being of many patients.

You’ll be an influential member of the wider team.

Not quite the role for you?

Join Our Talent Community and we’ll reach out with job alerts when positions that match your career interests become available. We’ll also share periodic updates about the latest company news and events.

Sign up today https://jobs.parexel.com/functional-service-provider

EEO Disclaimer

Parexel is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to legally protected status, which in the US includes race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status.

If you have questions about this posting, please contact support@lensa.com

  • Able to maintain study workbooks and data management files.
  • Perform database lock and freeze activities per company SOPs.
  • Provide input into the development of data management SOPs, Work Instructions, and process documents.

Here are a few requirements specific to this advertised role.

  • Bachelor’s Degree required (Master's Degree preferred) in the scientific/healthcare field.
  • At least two years’ experience in Data Management for the pharmaceutical/biotechnology industry.
  • Understanding of the scope and focus of Phase I – IV clinical studies, and a proven ability to perform some of the core Data Management tasks and interact with vendors.
  • An understanding of regulatory guidelines and industry standards (e.g., ICH/FDA guidance, CDISC standards, GCDMP, 21 CFR 11, MedDRA, WHO Drug Dictionaries, etc.) and their application to Data Management practice.
  • Attention to detail and the ability to work individually, within a multi-disciplinary team, as well as with external partners and vendors.
  • Strong English language written and verbal communication skills.
  • Able to travel to meetings or training seminars on occasion.
  • Possesses solid computer system and technical skills with a strong ability to learn multiple computer applications. Prior experience with different Data Management systems and technologies, and Electronic Data Capture systems is desirable.
  • Experience and understanding of the Oncology or CNS therapeutic area and with Phase III pivotal studies are desirable.

We care about our people and your passion, as they are the key to our success, and provide an open and friendly work environment where we empower people and provide them with opportunities to develop their long-term careers. In addition, you will have the opportunity to develop within your role and tackle further responsibilities or develop your skill set within other related departments of Parexel.

Who Are Parexel

Parexel supports clinical studies across the full range of therapeutic areas, and we have longstanding partnerships with a vast client base.

We supported the trials of most of today’s top 50 best-selling drugs, but equally we enable more niche drug developments that are critical to the well-being of many patients.

You’ll be an influential member of the wider team.

Not quite the role for you?

Join Our Talent Community and we’ll reach out with job alerts when positions that match your career interests become available. We’ll also share periodic updates about the latest company news and events.

Sign up today https://jobs.parexel.com/functional-service-provider

EEO Disclaimer

Parexel is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to legally protected status, which in the US includes race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status.

If you have questions about this posting, please contact support@lensa.com

Title: Software Engineer - Entry Level
Description:
Lensa is a career site that helps job seekers find great jobs in the US. We are not a staffing firm or agency. Lensa does not hire directly for these jobs, but promotes jobs on LinkedIn on behalf of its direct clients, recruitment ad agencies, and marketing partners. Lensa partners with DirectEmployers to promote this job for Jacobs. Clicking "Apply Now" or "Read more" on Lensa redirects you to the job board/employer site. Any information collected there is subject to their terms and privacy notice.

Become part of a respected and hard-working team delivering innovative, next generation aviation solutions to our customers across the globe. We design, build, and secure critical military aircraft solutions using unique technology application and Agile software development capabilities to improve mission agility, capability, and operational readiness.

Responsibilities

As an integral member of our team, you will hone your skills in backend and frontend technologies to support aircraft specific solutions and integrate with flight hardware. Successful candidates will:


Contribute on a team of skilled engineers designing, building and maintaining thoroughly tested and stable software using a Scaled Agile Framework (SAFE).
Perform technical tasks to include design-requirements, documentation, code and unit/integration test procedures.
Maintain a collaborative approach with Product Owners, Software Architects, DevOps, Security and UX engineers.
Be willing to share knowledge through proactive creation of wikis and documentation to help the team.
Participate in daily stand-ups providing status updates and raise any technical issues with the rest of the team.
Contribute to pull request reviews, system demos, planning meetings and retrospectives.
Be able to switch and work on different projects as customer and program goals evolve.
Ask smart questions, take risks, and champion new ideas
Use judgment and originality by interpreting data; planning the work; and refining the methods and techniques being used
Bachelor's degree in a related scientific or engineering discipline.
Knowledge of object-oriented computer programming with direct experience using Visual Studio, C#/.NET, NodeJS, JavaScript/Typescript
Experience with common web frameworks and technologies (HTML5, CSS, React, etc.)
Knowledge of, and skill in applying software engineering principles and practices
Ability to communicate design processes, ideas, and solutions clearly and effectively to teams
Ability to effectively articulate technical challenges and solutions
The ability to obtain and maintain a US DoD Secret or higher security clearance


Our teams work a 9/80 compressed schedule

Preferred


Experience with aviation data
DevSecOps experience


Jacobs is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding, or medical conditions related to pregnancy, childbirth, or breastfeeding), age, medical condition, marital or domestic partner status, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression and transgender status, mental disability or physical disability, genetic information, military or veteran status, citizenship, low-income status or any other status or characteristic protected by applicable law. Learn more about your rights under Federal EEO laws and supplemental language.

If you have questions about this posting, please contact support@lensa.com

Title: Scientist
Description:
Business Development Manager (New York / New Jersey)




Are you passionate about advancing biomedical research and building strong client relationships?




We're looking for a Business Development professionals to cover the New York & New Jersey region working remotely as part of a dynamic and global team.




What You'll Do:

Grow and maintain relationships with biotech and pharma clients
Introduce innovative research solutions, especially in preclinical mouse model services
Collaborate with technical experts to deliver tailored offerings
Stay ahead of industry trends and share insights with internal teams
Advocate for cutting-edge tools in biomedical research




What We're Looking For:

PhD in life sciences (or equivalent experience)
Experience in in vivo pharmacology or drug discovery a plus
Mandarin Speaking
Strong communication, presentation, and relationship-building skills
Comfortable traveling ~25% (domestic & international)
Multilingual? That’s a bonus!




Contact me at shannon@greenlsr.com | 857 400 7901

Job Description

Skills - Experience And Requirements


BS/MS in Computer Science/Computer Engineering or related technical degree, or equivalent amount of education and experience
2+ years of experience in Software Test or Software Quality Assurance

Title: 后端研发（AI大模型应用）实习生
Company: 广东美的制冷设备有限公司
Description:
职位来源于实习僧。

【岗位职责】 1、负责研发创新提效系统的WEB后端接口开发与知识本体架构设计，具备良好的业务需求分析能力，能将规范编程风格落实到项目； 2、参与AI创新提效系统的开发部署，探索大模型（如deepseek R1等)在业务场景中的落地应用；基于Dify等低代码平台开发AI应用、通过代码实现RAG架构、提示词工程等大模型增强方案； 3、配合完成AI能力与现有业务系统的技术集成，分析并优化大模型应用的性能与效果； 4、独立承担功能模块开发，保障代码质量与线上稳定性； 【任职资格】 1、硕士研究生及以上学历，至少有一段项目实战的实习经历，计算机、人工智能等相关专业，可全职实习6个月或以上； 2、扎实的Java基础能力，熟练掌握常见Java模块源码，设计模式，掌握多线程并发、集合等基础框架，掌握分布式、缓存、消息、事务等机制；熟悉SpringBoot、SpringCloud开发微服务，掌握MybatisPlus框架，RESTful规范，有相关开发经验者优先；掌握数据库设计和优化，掌握常用的数据库如MySQL、Redis，具备日志分析及问题定位能力； 3、掌握Nginx，Tomcat及Linux环境命令，具备Linux环境运维及系统调优能力； 4、具有Dify/Coze等低代码AI平台开发经历，掌握Agent及AI工作流设计方法，掌握提示词工程技巧，能通过few-shot prompting、Chain-of-Thought等方法优化模型输出； 6、熟悉Protégé本体论，有过基于Protégé、知识本体、知识图谱Neo4j等AI相关研究项目经历优先 【综合素质】 1、对AGI技术发展有强烈兴趣，持续关注知识图谱、大模型技术演进 2、具备技术文档阅读和撰写能力，能清晰表达技术方案 3、自驱力强，能够独立排查和解决问题、洞察新技术 预期收获： 1、深入理解大模型时代的企业级AI应用开发范式，掌握RAG、Function Calling等前沿AI工程化技术 2、获得从0到1搭建知识本体与知识图谱的完整项目经验 3、参与行业领先的创新方法研究与应用实践、提升解决问题的能力

职位薪资：

150-200/天

想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.midea.com.cn

150-200/天

想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.midea.com.cn

Title: AI解决方案专家(RAG)
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 职责描述: 岗位描述： 负责设计和管理基于检索增强生成（RAG）技术的产品，在Agent和知识库两种场景下持续优化用户体验和系统性能。根据业务需求，规划RAG相关的数据策略和文档处理能力。 主要职责： 1. 负责RAG系统的产品规划和功能设计，包括知识库管理、检索优化、推理逻辑等核心功能。 2. 制定产品路线图，确定技术方向和功能优先级。 3. 深度参与产品架构方案设计，确保RAG知识库在应用场景的性能和用户体验持续优化。 4. 收集并分析用户需求，提出改进建议，推动产品迭代。 5. 设计产品交互流程，优化用户界面，提升产品易用性。 6. 参与设计RAG知识库的重排算法、入库算法等全链路开发环节，从产品角度设计测试方法和评估方案。 7. 协调各部门资源，推进产品开发进度，确保项目按时交付。 8. 跟踪行业动态，研究竞品，确保产品保持市场竞争力。 任职要求: 1. 本科及以上学历，计算机及相关专业优先，具备5年以上相关工作经验。 2. 深入理解RAG技术原理，熟悉langchain、llamaindex等RAG开发框架。 3. 对AI大模型、知识图谱、搜索算法有深入了解。 4. 具备出色的产品设计能力，能快速将技术特性转化为产品功能。 5. 良好的项目管理能力，能有效协调跨部门资源。 6. 优秀的沟通能力和文档写作能力。 7. 具备基本的技术背景，能与开发团队有效沟通。 优先考虑： 1. 有AI产品开发经验，特别是搜索引擎或知识管理系统相关经验。 2. 熟悉大模型应用开发流程，了解Prompt工程， DeepSeek、Lora等微调技术原理。 3. 具备数据分析能力，能利用数据驱动产品决策。 4. 有Agent系统或知识图谱产品经验。 5. 具备非常扎实的Java或Python开发经验

Title: 业财流程与数字化主任/高专
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责： 1、财务流程数字化：参与设计和优化数字化的财务流程方案，并协助推动实施落地； 2、数字化项目推动与协作：作为财务部门与IT/数据团队/业务部门在数字化项目中的关键联络人，准确传达需求、反馈进展、协调资源； 3、报表与可视化： 熟练使用工具（如Excel高级功能、Power BI, Tableau等）开发、维护并分发常规财务报告和管理报表（如成本分析、盈利分析、预算执行差异分析、现金流预测等）； 4、数据提取与清洗： 根据需求，从各财务及相关业务系统（如销售、供应链）中提取、清洗、整合所需财务数据。 任职要求： 1、教育背景：本科及以上学历，会计或财务相关专业； 2、经验要求：3年以上会计或财务相关的工作经验； 3、技能要求：良好的数据分析和可视化能力，了解SQL基础，至少熟练使用一种主流工具（如Power BI, Tableau, FineReport）或财务系统自带分析工具； 4、核心素质：优秀的逻辑思维、问题解决和分析能力；积极主动，具备持续改进流程的思维和行动力。
Show more

Title: Python全栈开发实习生
Company: 广州至真信息科技有限公司
Description:
职位来源于实习僧。

岗位职责： 1. 熟悉业务流程平台架构和配置，具有与其他系统和第三方平台接口开发和设计能力； 2. 负责App和web网站的服务端架构设计和开发，部署云服务器； 3. 负责系统分析与设计，并负责完成核心代码； 4. 负责工具型或任务型微服务的设计与开发，搭建支付中台整体架构； 5. 根据开发规范与流程独立完成模块的设计、编码、测试以及相关文档撰写。 任职要求： 1、26届双一流硕士及以上学历，有Python编程经验，有Ai类实际项目经验优先； 2、熟悉Django、Flask、FastAPI等Web开发框架； 3、熟悉Docker、Conda、Jenkins、Gitlib 的维护，并且有独立部署Server的经验； 4、掌握JavaScript、html、CSS，熟练使用React、Electron、Vue3、Bootstrap等前端框架； 5、熟悉微服务架构的整体设计及接口规范，高并发处理，如：REST API，有独立维护项目的经验； 6、熟练使用MongoDB、PostgreSQL等主流数据库。

职位薪资：

150-300/天

想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：https://www.zhizhengroup.com/

Title: AI/ML Engineer
Company: 北京星展科技有限公司
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 Roles & Responsibilities


Apply machine learning, generative AI and big data to build, manage and automate applications and pipelines for analytics platform
Design and develop ML Ops platform for the future requirements of the business, with fairness and robustness in mind
Implement and apply industry standard ML solutions to solve real world challenges
Study and evaluate the state-of-the-art technologies, tools, and frameworks of machine learning engineering, and establish, apply and maintain best practices and principles of machine learning
Perform code optimization, code reviews to improve the quality of work
Automate software testing by writing unit tests for all production code
Manage available resources such as hardware, data, and personnel so that deadlines are met
Work with different stakeholders to ensure that the bank’s production release process is adhered to Requirements
Bachelor’s or master’s degree in software engineering, computer science or related fields
4+ years of experience in industry (ideally banking) with demonstrated track record of application development in advanced analytics and machine learning to achieve business impact.
Excellent understanding of software engineering principles and design patterns.
Excellent programming skills in Python (preferably scikit-learn, FastAPI & Strawberry) and willingness to learn other languages as required by the project.
Good knowledge on SQL, joining and worked on database like MySQL or Oracle or any other related database.
Good knowledge on working with tools such as JIRA, Git and Jenkins.
Experience in working with Agile software development ecosystem.
Preferably experience with PCF and AWS SageMaker.
Good to have experience in PySpark and knowledge of BigData ecosystem.
Strong in problem-solving, being resourceful with end to end critical thinking to find out solutions even in unfamiliar scenarios.
Good communication and project management skills.
Strong interests in learning about recent developments in machine learning through own initiatives.
Show more

Title: AI算法工程师（实习）(J12741)
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 职责描述： 1.负责基于深度学习的路侧感知算法研发，如3D目标检测算法、交通标线识别算法；


负责基于激光点云、视频数据的深度学习模型训练、优化与部署；
负责相关专利或技术报告撰写。 任职要求： 1.计算机、电子、通信、数学类相关专业在读研究生（优秀者可放宽至在读本科），能够提供长期稳定的实习时间（≥6个月）；
具有良好的数学功底，对深度学习、机器学习有较深入的理解与认识，熟悉BEV或者Occupancy感知算法者优先； 3.掌握C\C++\Python，熟悉ros等工具使用，具有较强的工程实现能力； 4.熟练使用Pytorch、TensorRT等工具。

Title: Analytics Engineer- Data Operations & Governance
Description:
Responsibilities:

Data Operations & Governance: Own the accuracy, reliability, and structure of product and user-event data through robust governance practices; Define and enforce standards for event tracking, data schemas, and documentation across teams; Conduct regular audits, validation checks, and coordinate instrumentation changes with engineering and product teams
Data Pipeline Development & Maintenance: Build and maintain scalable, observable data pipelines using tools like dbt, Airflow, or similar frameworks; Monitor pipeline health, implement alerting systems, and resolve data issues with root cause analysis; Optimize pipeline performance and ensure high availability of core datasets for analytics and reporting
Internal Tooling & Automation: Develop and maintain internal data tools, utilities, and dashboards using SQL, Python, and lightweight web technologies; Automate workflows to reduce manual reporting and improve operational efficiency for data stakeholders; Create reusable data models that support fast iteration and confident self-service analysis
Competitive Intelligence & Data Collection: Operate and enhance data scraping workflows to collect structured information on competitors, pricing, and market trends; Ensure scraping systems are stable, maintainable, and compliant with data privacy and ethical standards





Requirements:
Engineering Foundation: Strong SQL and working proficiency in Python or JavaScript for building and maintaining data infrastructure; Experience with modern data engineering tools (e.g., dbt, Airflow, Fivetran, Dagster); Familiarity with version control (Git), code modularization, and documentation practices
Data Quality & Governance Experience: Track record designing or maintaining data governance practices in product analytics environments (e.g., Segment, GA4, Mixpanel); Comfortable building QA checks, anomaly detection, and data validation processes; Familiarity with data governance education and data governance related stakeholder management
Operational Mindset: Comfortable being on point for data issues, debugging pipeline failures, and ensuring continuity in reporting and dashboards; Ability to set up alerting/logging mechanisms to proactively detect and respond to data problems
Collaboration & Communication: Strong written and verbal communication skills to align with product, engineering, and business teams; Able to translate business questions into engineering requirements and technical work into stakeholder-friendly language
Preferred Qualifications: Prior experience / knowledge on data science / machine learning; Prior experience on hands-on data engineering; Understanding of data operation & governance in analytics workflows; Experience supporting data for experimentation or A/B testing pipelines





Show more

  • Data Pipeline Development & Maintenance: Build and maintain scalable, observable data pipelines using tools like dbt, Airflow, or similar frameworks; Monitor pipeline health, implement alerting systems, and resolve data issues with root cause analysis; Optimize pipeline performance and ensure high availability of core datasets for analytics and reporting
  • Internal Tooling & Automation: Develop and maintain internal data tools, utilities, and dashboards using SQL, Python, and lightweight web technologies; Automate workflows to reduce manual reporting and improve operational efficiency for data stakeholders; Create reusable data models that support fast iteration and confident self-service analysis

Title: 自动驾驶数据分析工程师
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责： 1. 负责分析自动驾驶仿真和路测的数据，根据其中的传感器，规划，感知，定位等模块的信息，以及测试人员提供的信息找出自动驾驶系统硬件或软件存在的问题并协助进行问题的解决。 2. 根据自动驾驶车辆目前存在的不足，提出改进的方案，并与相关功能开发模块合作，完成改进方案的指定与落实 3. 完成日常的新功能的仿真、路测工作，确认新功能的效果是否与预期相匹配 要求： 1. 你对自动驾驶有所了解，或者对某一个模块的方向有比较深入的了解 2. 熟练使用python等脚本语言，编写自动化脚本提高数据分析的效率 3. 有比较好的逻辑思维，能从表面的现象探究出背后的问题

Title: Rust Engineer (Greenfield project)
Description:
We are a team to design, develop, maintain, and improve software for various ventures projects, i.e., projects that are adjacent to our core businesses and are bootstrapped fast with a lean team. You will be actively involved in the design of various components behind scalable applications, from frontend UI to backend infrastructure.




Job Responsibilities
Development activities include development, proposing architectural decisions, participating in designs, design review, code review, and implementation Identify issues and implement solutions to complex problems in the blockchain protocol
Analyze and solve difficult problems across the blockchain protocol
Work closely with operations and infrastructure to build high scale backend services
Management of documentation of all code and functionalities implemented
Work closely with DevOps and ecosystem engineers to improve tech stack for long-term engineering initiatives





Job Requirement
Interested in building first-class product to solve real-world problems
Experienced with various technologies, a fast learner and have a "get things done" mentality
Strong organizational skills, interpersonal skills and having the ability to juggle conflicting requirements from many different stakeholders
Humble to embrace better ideas from others, eager to make things better, open to challenges and possibilities
Self-starter who can define and execute tasks with minimal guidance
Open to learning, collaborative, willing to give and receive feedback 5+ years of engineering experience, preferably strong backend development experience (e.g. Go, Rust, Java, Erlang)
Hands-on experience in using basic cryptographic primitives (e.g. BouncyCastle in Java): digital signatures, key exchange, symmetric and asymmetric encryption Basic knowledge of distributed systems and understanding of consensus algorithms, such as Raft or PBFT
Experience with or interest in Go or Rust Hands-on experience with any existing blockchain system internals is welcomed but not required








Life @ Crypto.com




Empowered to think big. Try new opportunities while working with a talented, ambitious and supportive team.

Transformational and proactive working environment. Empower employees to find thoughtful and innovative solutions.

Growth from within. We help to develop new skill-sets that would impact the shaping of your personal and professional growth.

Work Culture. Our colleagues are some of the best in the industry; we are all here to help and support one another.

One cohesive team. Engage stakeholders to achieve our ultimate goal - Cryptocurrency in every wallet.

Work Flexibility Adoption. Flexi-work hour and hybrid or remote set-up

Aspire career alternatives through us - our internal mobility program offers employees a new scope.

Work Perks: crypto.com visa card provided upon joining




Are you ready to kickstart your future with us?




Benefits




Competitive salary

Attractive annual leave entitlement including: birthday, work anniversary

Work Flexibility Adoption. Flexi-work hour and hybrid or remote set-up

Aspire career alternatives through us. Our internal mobility program can offer employees a diverse scope.

Work Perks: crypto.com visa card provided upon joining




Our Crypto.com benefits packages vary depending on region requirements, you can learn more from our talent acquisition team.







About Crypto.com:




Founded in 2016, Crypto.com serves more than 80 million customers and is the world's fastest growing global cryptocurrency platform. Our vision is simple: Cryptocurrency in Every Wallet™. Built on a foundation of security, privacy, and compliance, Crypto.com is committed to accelerating the adoption of cryptocurrency through innovation and empowering the next generation of builders, creators, and entrepreneurs to develop a fairer and more equitable digital ecosystem.




Learn more at https://crypto.com.




Crypto.com is an equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating an environment where opportunities are presented to everyone in a fair and transparent way. Crypto.com values diversity and inclusion, seeking candidates with a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills that complement and strengthen our team.




Personal data provided by applicants will be used for recruitment purposes only.




Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

  • Strong organizational skills, interpersonal skills and having the ability to juggle conflicting requirements from many different stakeholders
  • Humble to embrace better ideas from others, eager to make things better, open to challenges and possibilities
  • Self-starter who can define and execute tasks with minimal guidance
  • Open to learning, collaborative, willing to give and receive feedback 5+ years of engineering experience, preferably strong backend development experience (e.g. Go, Rust, Java, Erlang)
  • Hands-on experience in using basic cryptographic primitives (e.g. BouncyCastle in Java): digital signatures, key exchange, symmetric and asymmetric encryption Basic knowledge of distributed systems and understanding of consensus algorithms, such as Raft or PBFT
  • Experience with or interest in Go or Rust Hands-on experience with any existing blockchain system internals is welcomed but not required

Title: 业财流程与数字化专员
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责： 1、财务流程数字化：参与设计和优化数字化的财务流程方案，并协助推动实施落地； 2、数字化项目推动与协作：作为财务部门与IT/数据团队/业务部门在数字化项目中的关键联络人，准确传达需求、反馈进展、协调资源； 3、报表与可视化： 熟练使用工具（如Excel高级功能、Power BI, Tableau等）开发、维护并分发常规财务报告和管理报表（如成本分析、盈利分析、预算执行差异分析、现金流预测等）； 4、数据提取与清洗： 根据需求，从各财务及相关业务系统（如销售、供应链）中提取、清洗、整合所需财务数据。 任职要求： 1、教育背景：本科及以上学历，会计或财务相关专业； 2、经验要求：3年以上会计或财务相关的工作经验； 3、技能要求：良好的数据分析和可视化能力，了解SQL基础，至少熟练使用一种主流工具（如Power BI, Tableau, FineReport）或财务系统自带分析工具； 4、核心素质：优秀的逻辑思维、问题解决和分析能力；积极主动，具备持续改进流程的思维和行动力。

Title: Blockchain Solutions Engineer - Developer Relations
Description:
About the role




We are seeking a Blockchain Solutions Engineer/Developer Relations Engineer to join our vibrant blockchain team. As a Blockchain Solutions Engineer, you will be the bridge between blockchains and the broader developer community. Your mission is to foster strong relationships with developers, providing them with the tools, resources, and support to thrive within the blockchain ecosystem. This position requires a keen interest in blockchain technology, a collaborative spirit, and a commitment to providing exceptional technical support and guidance.




Role Responsibilities
Stay updated on blockchain industry trends, emerging technologies, and the competitive landscape to identify opportunities for growth and improvement
Engage with the developer community to gather valuable insights, identify areas for product enhancement, and solve the problems
Serve as a proactive champion for developers, actively addressing their concerns, and facilitating a supportive and engaging community environment
Collaborate with various teams such as product, marketing, and engineering teams to ensure developer relations initiatives are aligned with business strategies and objectives
Create and maintain comprehensive technical documentation, tutorials, sample code, and other resources to empower developers
Provide timely and effective technical support to developers, assisting with troubleshooting, technical inquiries, and integration challenges





Required Skills and Qualifications
Positive attitude with a strong desire to learn and grow within a Community Management and Engineering team
Familiarity with community management platforms such as Telegram and Discord
Basic understanding of programming languages and software development tools, for example: Solidity, TypeScript, Golang or Rust
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience
Minimum 1 year of experience in a similar role, with exposure to software engineering, customer support, or developer relations
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts in a clear and user-friendly manner
Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail
Solid in English Communications

Title: (Senior)Quality Assurance Automation Engineer (Crypto.com APP)
Description:
We are a team to design, develop, maintain, and improve software for various ventures projects, i.e., projects that are adjacent to our core businesses and are bootstrapped fast with a lean team. You will be actively involved in the design of various components behind scalable applications, from frontend UI to backend infrastructure.




Responsibility
Develop and execute test plans and test cases with a strong emphasis on using code to solve technical challenges and shorten the test cycle through automation. 
Estimate test efforts, analyze and communicate test results and participate in day to day QA Activities. 
Develop/Maintain and improve the test frameworks, tools and technologies used by the organization to maintain a high quality bar. 
Work with Development, Test and Product Management to design and implement test and validation strategies. 
Execute and manage test cases and results, report on test and defect metrics. 
Create, execute and troubleshoot automated test scenarios across our systems. 
Contribute to robust, scalable, and high quality test automation solutions for functional, regression and performance testing 
Contribute to the building of a Continuous Integration (CI) environment and ongoing process improvement activities. 
Identify required improvements in the test and development processes; make contributions to our automation tools that address specific needs. 
Maintain a high quality bar in a complex and constantly evolving workspace. 





Requirements
Experience with mobile testing and automated test techniques with a strong focus on quality throughout the entire software development cycle. 
Experience in REST and WebSocket API automation testing with Python/Java. 
Experience in working with different frameworks like Pytest, Pytest-bdd, Appium, Selenium, Cucumber etc. 
Good knowledge of object oriented programming, along with requisite coding and debugging skills. 
Design and development skills in Python/Java. 
Understanding of software design principles, patterns, algorithms, data structures and multi-threading concepts. 
Proven ability to translate functional requirements and use cases into working test plans and test cases. 
Strong customer focus, excellent problem solving and analytical skills. 
Strong verbal and written communication skills. 
Some knowledge of continuous integration practices, Jenkins or CircleCI. 
Experience working in an agile environment is preferred.  
Ability to work across Windows, Linux is a plus. 
Passion for improving code quality through interaction with the development team. 
Demonstrated skill in using coding standards and being an active participant in code reviews.

Title: AI高级开发工程师
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 Core Responsibilities: o Lead architecture design and implementation of generative AI projects (e.g., Copilot, AI assistants). o Explore cutting-edge AI technologies (e.g., LLMs, multimodal models) and optimize business applications.


Technical Skills: o Proficient in Python/TensorFlow/PyTorch, and frameworks like OpenAI and LangChain. o Hands-on experience in generative AI projects (e.g., chatbots, content generation).
Experience: o 2+ years in AI, with at least one end-to-end AI project leadership role. o Published research papers or patents preferred.
Soft Skills: Technical leadership and cross-team collaboration capabilities.
Communication skills: Fluent in English listening, speaking, reading, and writing.

Title: 机器人算法工程师(J10149)
Description:
职位来自于拉勾

工作职责:


负责机器人（无人机、自驾仪和无人车）运动规划和控制算法开发；
进行前沿算法的研究与实现；
解决算法开发与测试过程中的问题；
完成上级安排的其他工作任务。


任职资格:


熟悉linux和C++编程;
熟悉常用的规划算法，如A*、Dijkstra、RRT、TEB、无约束乃至带约束二次规划等;
熟悉控制理论;
有相关机器人算法开发经验。

Title: 微短剧数据分析助理实习生
Company: 广东人民出版社有限公司
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责： 1.追踪整理微短剧项目行业费用变化，协助进行微短剧项目财务工作协助如预算分析等。 2.收集短剧榜单及观众喜好变化数据，提供微短剧项目内容策划数据基础。 3.深度解析微短剧的用户画像及路径，协同团队达成业务增长留存目标。 4.其他：完成领导指定的其他工作任务。 任职要求： 1.对微短剧行业有浓厚兴趣，了解主流短剧平台及行业现状等。 2.具备一定的数据分析能力和财务会计能力。 3.熟练使用Office办公软件及财务工具如用友U8。 4.工作积极主动，学习能力强，能适应快节奏、多任务并行的工作模式。

Title: 智慧城市软件产品研发负责人（香港/珠海）
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责 1.负责组织、管理从方案到测试全流程研发团队人员，以满足产品进度、质量与创新需求；


负责制定提升产品模块的复用性、拓展性与可靠性的技术方案； 3.负责数字化产品架构设计，参与系统核心算法、关键技术模块的代码编写工作，确保代码质量和技术先进性。 岗位要求 1.计算机、自动化、电子工程或相关专业本科及以上学历，5年软件研发管理相关工作经验；
掌握智慧城市各种业务场景与模型，深入理解智慧城市业务需求，对智慧城市运营中心（IOC）、建筑设备管理后台、能源管理平台以及充电桩平台落地实施方案有较丰富经验 ；
精通Python/Java/C++/JavaScript等编程语言，熟悉前端框架（Vue.js/React/Angular），具备APP开发经验（Android/iOS/Flutter），了解PWA******开发技术，具备扎实的全栈开发和软硬件系统集成能力； 4.熟悉物联网技术栈，包括但不限于MQTT、CoAP、LoRaWAN等通信协议； 5.掌握数字孪生技术，熟悉Unity3D、ThreeJS、WebGL等3D渲染技术，有建筑或城市场景建模经验者优先；
具备优秀的分布式系统架构设计能力，熟悉微服务架构、容器化部署、云原生技术 ；
在技术方面有前瞻性视野，了解行业最新技术发展趋势并适时引入合适技术促进业务发展； 8.有良好沟通能力，良好的书面和口头表达能力，具备较高文档撰写水平，粤语流利者优先； 9.思维缜密，逻辑性强，具有挑战精神和前瞻性，良好的团队协作精神。有从0到1技术团队组建经验，具备优秀的跨部门协作和项目管理能力，持有PMP相关认证者优先。
Show more

Title: Associate Director, Software Engineering Specialist
Description:
Some careers have more impact than others.




If you’re looking for a career where you can make a real impression, join HSBC and discover how valued you’ll be.




We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of Associate Director, Software Engineering Specialist. (Full Stack)




Business: Emerging Technology




Principal responsibilities

Design and develop platform capabilities that span AWS, GCP, Azure, and Alibaba Cloud (Ali) environments, enabling seamless cloud and on-premise AI deployments.
Build and maintain automated pipelines for continuous training, testing, and deployment of machine learning models, incorporating Responsible AI controls.
Design and development of one of key platform components—including model gardens, AI gateways, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) pipelines, and Agent Frameworks—to accelerate AI solution delivery.
Ensure strict adherence to architectural principles, technical standards, security requirements, and the software development life cycle (SDLC).
Troubleshoot complex platform issues, ensuring successful, high-quality, and resilient AI services in production.
Establish best practices for engineering, including CI/CD pipelines, testing frameworks, and monitoring tools, and drive continual improvement of engineering processes.
Collaborate closely with AI engineers, stakeholders, and customers to translate AI capabilities into production-ready systems that meet business needs.




Requirements

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field; equivalent experience will be considered.
5+ years of experience in software engineering.
Proficiency in one or more programming languages: Python, Java, or Golang.
Experience in developing large-scale platforms supporting multi-tenancy and high-concurrency parallel requests.
Proven expertise in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, Alibaba Cloud) and container orchestration technologies (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker).
Strong track record in MLOps, including CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and observability in machine learning applications.
Experience in AI or Generative AI projects is a plus.
Excellent problem-solving, communication, and stakeholder management skills.
Proven ability to deliver large-scale, mission-critical platforms from concept to production.




You’ll achieve more when you join HSBC.




HSBC is an equal opportunity employer committed to building a culture where all employees are valued, respected and opinions count. We take pride in providing a workplace that fosters continuous professional development, flexible working and, opportunities to grow within an inclusive and diverse environment. We encourage applications from all suitably qualified persons irrespective of, but not limited to, their gender or genetic information, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, social status, medical care leave requirements, political affiliation, people with disabilities, color, national origin, veteran status, etc., We consider all applications based on merit and suitability to the role.




Personal data held by the Bank relating to employment applications will be used in accordance with our Privacy Statement, which is available on our website.




***Issued By HSBC Software Development (GuangDong) Limited***




Job ID: 0000LIF9

Title: Software Engineer - Virtual AI Pet Coaches / 软件工程师 - 虚拟 AI 宠物教练
Description:
Our studio is building a new generation of AI-powered virtual pets—companions that grow, learn, and interact with users in real time. We’re at the 0→1 stage and need an engineer who can own both robust backend systems and delightful frontend experiences.

Responsibilities


Design and build a scalable full-stack architecture (Python/TypeScript backend, React/Next.js frontend)
Implement real-time pet simulation: feeding, mood, growth, and event loops
Develop and optimize REST / WebSocket APIs, microservices, and PostgreSQL schemas
Integrate AI behavior trees, voice synthesis, and conversational models to give pets personality
Write clean, maintainable code with comprehensive tests; lead code reviews and mentor juniors
Work closely with product, design, and game-play teams to iterate on core pet interactions
Drive best practices in performance, security, observability, and CI/CD on Docker/Kubernetes
Research and introduce new tech (FastAPI, tRPC, edge functions) to boost velocity and capability


Requirements


5+ years of professional software development, with strong backend focus
Proficiency in Python, TypeScript, React/Next.js
Experience with FastAPI, Django, or Flask, and modern frontend tooling
Solid grasp of REST design, microservice architecture, and PostgreSQL data modeling
Familiarity with AWS/GCP/Azure, containerization, and automated pipelines
Bonus: exposure to AI/ML APIs, real-time game or simulation systems, or voice/chat integrations
Strong problem-solving and communication skills; passion for pets, games, or virtual companionship is a plus


我们的使命是打造最具沉浸感、最有情感连接的 AI 虚拟宠物，让用户随时随地与心爱的数码伙伴互动、培养、成长。团队正处于产品 0→1 关键阶段，期待一位既擅长后端系统又懂前端体验的工程师加入，一起把想象中的宠物世界变成现实。

职责


设计并实现可水平扩展的全栈架构（后端 Python/TypeScript，前端 React/Next.js）。
构建实时宠物模拟与状态同步服务，包括喂养、情绪、成长等核心循环。
设计并优化 REST / WebSocket API、微服务与 PostgreSQL 模式。
集成并调优 AI 行为树、语音合成及情感对话模型，为宠物赋予灵魂。
编写干净、可维护的代码与完备测试；进行代码评审、指导初级工程师。
与产品、设计和游戏策划紧密协作，持续迭代宠物交互体验。
推动性能、安全性与可观察性最佳实践；维护 CI/CD 与容器化部署流程。
探索并引入新技术（如 FastAPI、tRPC、Edge Functions）提升开发效率与产品能力。


任职要求


5 年以上专业软件开发经验，后端功底扎实。
熟练掌握 Python、TypeScript、React/Next.js。
熟悉 FastAPI、Django 或 Flask 等后端框架与前端现代工具链。
扎实的 REST 设计、微服务架构与 PostgreSQL 数据建模能力。
了解云平台（AWS/GCP/Azure）、Docker/Kubernetes 与 CI/CD。
有 AI/机器学习 API 或实时游戏/模拟系统集成经验者优先。
具备出色的问题分析与团队沟通能力，热爱宠物、游戏或虚拟陪伴生态更佳。

  • 具备出色的问题分析与团队沟通能力，热爱宠物、游戏或虚拟陪伴生态更佳。

Title: 解决方案经理/解决方案工程师
Company: 广州都市圈网络科技有限公司
Description:
职位来自于拉勾

岗位职责：

1、分析自然资源行业的国家、省、市等相关政策，指引客户需求，并运用到项目策划和售前工作中；

2、承担相关项目的前期咨询规划工作，包括：项目申报书、项目建议书、项目可研报告、项目初步设计等咨询方案的编写；

2、主导具体项目的售前工作，开展需求调研、业务分析、业务解决方案梳理、需求分析等工作，完成调研报告和需求分析；

3、负责行业客户交流，挖掘、分析、理解客户需求，制定相关的解决方案；

任职要求：

1、本科以上学历，GIS、计算机、城乡规划、土地利用规划相关专业，具备国土、规划相关行业从业背景；

2、有良好的沟通能力与技巧，拥有解决突发事件的能力；

3、优秀的学习能力及方案撰写能力；

4、能适应出差。

Title: YF01--数字验证工程师
Company: 广东省大湾区集成电路与系统应用研究院
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 工作内容： 1、参与汽车电子数模混合芯片的建模和验证； 2、使用C，System Verilog，UVM等语言/工具开发验证平台和验证用例，实现高效率的芯片功能和性能验证，满足Tape Out高质量高可靠性要求； 3、协助完成相关覆盖率分析，输出验证方案和验证报告文档。 任职要求： 1、计算机科学与技术、微电子、自动化等理工类相关专业； 2、本科以上学历，2025届毕业生（大三或者研二同学），能够连续实习4个月以上； 3、有学习新的相关技术和工具的热情，具有逻辑和创造性的思维能力，具备英语阅读能力，沟通和解决问题的能力。 该岗位入职到研究院孵化的产业化公司--中科赛飞。

Title: AI Intern(外企+双休+实战AI项目）
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责 1. AI应用开发与优化： a) 基于LLM框架（如LangChain）构建和演示AI Agent，实现知识检索、任务自动化等功能。 b) 开发和优化RAG（Retrieval-Augmented Generation）系统，包括流程设计、知识库集成和响应生成。 c) 参与模型微调（Fine-tuning）全流程：数据处理、指令微调（SFT）、评估训练有效性，并解决微调中的幻觉问题。 d) 优化prompt工程和token使用量，提升AI系统的效率和成本效益。 2. 技术实现与部署： a) 在Microsoft生态系统（Azure、Power Platform）上部署AI解决方案，利用云服务进行模型训练和推理。 b) 处理多模态AI任务，如视频内容总结、图像处理或OCR模型开发，包括模块设计和性能优化。 c) 实现AI应用的延迟优化（如同声传译场景）和错误处理（如Agent知识库不匹配）。 3. 项目协作与迭代： a) 协同团队处理数据集（清洗、标注、协同管理），支持模型训练和评估。 b) 参与端到端AI产品开发，从需求分析到成果交付，并协助评估模型表现（如信用评分系统、交通流量优化）。 c) 学习并应用新技术，快速迭代原型，基于反馈优化策略。 基本要求： 1. 教育背景：计算机科学、人工智能、机器学习、数据科学或相关领域的在校本科生/研究生。 2. 实习经验：有AI项目经验优先，例如LLM应用开发、模型微调或RAG系统构建（需在面试中展示具体项目负责部分和成果）。 3. 编程技能：熟练使用Python，熟悉常用库（如PyTorch、TensorFlow）；了解Java、SQL等（根据项目需求）。 核心技术知识： 1. LLM与AI概念：深入理解RAG流程、微调方法（指令微调、SFT等）、Agent框架（如LangChain）、Self-Attention机制；能比较开源模型（如Llama）与自开发模型的优劣。 2. 优化技能：熟悉prompt优化策略、token控制、延迟降低技术；能处理AI安全性问题（如数据隐私、幻觉）。 3. 工具与平台：熟悉Microsoft生态系统（Azure、Power Platform）；了解数据处理工具（如Kafka）、模型评估指标（如准确率、召回率）。 软技能与能力： 1. 问题解决：能独立解决技术挑战（如爬虫问题、模型错误），并解释优化策略。 2. 沟通协作：良好中英文沟通能力，能与团队和终端用户有效互动。 3. 学习能力：主动学习新技术（如通过在线资源、研究论文），快速适应项目需求。 4. 逻辑思维：清晰阐述项目流程、技术选型原因（如为什么用LSTM而非新模型）。 加分项 1. 有AI竞赛（如算法竞赛）或研究项目经验。 2. 熟悉AI同声传译、实时系统开发。 3. 了解开源大模型（如GPT系列、Claude）的部署和比较。 4. 有终端用户支持经验或产品推广能力。
Show more

Title: Mid/Sr Frontend Developer/Fullstack Developer(Mainapp)
Description:
We are a team to design, develop, maintain, and improve software for various ventures projects, i.e., projects that are adjacent to our core businesses and are bootstrapped fast with a lean team. You will be actively involved in the design of various components behind scalable applications, from frontend UI to backend infrastructure.




Requirements
Collaborate closely with product managers and designers to implement and refine frontend features
Utilize your outstanding UI/UX sense to ensure a seamless and visually appealing user experience
Stay abreast of the latest industry trends and best practices in frontend development





Responsibilities
Minimum of 3- 5 years of experience as a Frontend Developer
Solid understanding of JavaScript and Frontend fundamentals
Proficient understanding of HTTP
In-depth knowledge of one of the tech stacks, including React/Vue/Angular
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
Strong UI/UX sense and a meticulous approach to design details
Familiarity with trading/exchange-related projects is a significant plus








Life @ Crypto.com




Empowered to think big. Try new opportunities while working with a talented, ambitious and supportive team.

Transformational and proactive working environment. Empower employees to find thoughtful and innovative solutions.

Growth from within. We help to develop new skill-sets that would impact the shaping of your personal and professional growth.

Work Culture. Our colleagues are some of the best in the industry; we are all here to help and support one another.

One cohesive team. Engage stakeholders to achieve our ultimate goal - Cryptocurrency in every wallet.

Work Flexibility Adoption. Flexi-work hour and hybrid or remote set-up

Aspire career alternatives through us - our internal mobility program offers employees a new scope.

Work Perks: crypto.com visa card provided upon joining




Are you ready to kickstart your future with us?




Benefits




Competitive salary

Attractive annual leave entitlement including: birthday, work anniversary

Work Flexibility Adoption. Flexi-work hour and hybrid or remote set-up

Aspire career alternatives through us. Our internal mobility program can offer employees a diverse scope.

Work Perks: crypto.com visa card provided upon joining




Our Crypto.com benefits packages vary depending on region requirements, you can learn more from our talent acquisition team.







About Crypto.com:




Founded in 2016, Crypto.com serves more than 80 million customers and is the world's fastest growing global cryptocurrency platform. Our vision is simple: Cryptocurrency in Every Wallet™. Built on a foundation of security, privacy, and compliance, Crypto.com is committed to accelerating the adoption of cryptocurrency through innovation and empowering the next generation of builders, creators, and entrepreneurs to develop a fairer and more equitable digital ecosystem.




Learn more at https://crypto.com.




Crypto.com is an equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating an environment where opportunities are presented to everyone in a fair and transparent way. Crypto.com values diversity and inclusion, seeking candidates with a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills that complement and strengthen our team.




Personal data provided by applicants will be used for recruitment purposes only.




Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Title: 研发工程师-广研
Company: 国机智能科技有限公司
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 【传感器研发】 1、参与油液监测传感器研究设计、改进等工作； 2、参与油液监测传感器测试沟通、协调等工作； 【数据分析与故障诊断方向】 1、参与机械设备润滑磨损故障、振动故障分析与诊断工作； 2、参与设备状态监测大数据分析、诊断规则和模型建立等工作； 3、参与设备油液监测与振动监测等多状态监测数据融合与诊断工作； 【软件平台建设】 1、负责对润滑监测云平台市场调研分析、发展目标分析、制定产品竞争策略； 2、负责设计并构建润滑监测数据平台、落实底层数据分析平台的设计和架构体系搭建工作； 3、负责合作研究基于润滑监测的大数据分析系统构建； 4、负责数据分析与协同平台的性能、可用性、扩展性等监控与优化工作。 任职要求: 【招聘单位】：设备润滑与检测研究所/广研检测（广州）有限公司 【任职要求】： 1、 具有博士研究生学历或即将取得博士学位； 2、 专业要求：具有机械类、电子类、材料类、物理类、化学类、信息类、控制理论与工程类、力学、轮机工程、工业软件、计算机等相关专业； 3、 承担过传感器开发及样机试制工作者优先； 4、 有较好的团队协作能力，良好的沟通能力； 5、 具体良好的创新能力，具有较强的问题分析和解决能力，有较强的责任心和职业精神，做事认真负责，积极进取。

Title: 广州大学城Node.js开发

职位来自于拉勾

使用 Node.js 构建高性能、可扩展的前后端服务

负责 Web 前端（React）开发，确保良好的用户体验与性能 （偏向后端，前端有一定了解和项目经验即可）

优化现有系统性能与架构，参与技术选型与架构设计

Node.js（Express等框架）

熟练掌握 JavaScript / TypeScript，理解异步编程、事件循环等机制

RESTful API / GraphQL 开发经验

WebSocket / SSE 实时通信开发

基础SQL数据库操作（Postgres优先）

熟悉消息队列、缓存等中间件的应用与开发

熟悉云服务和serverless开发（AWS，Vercel，Supabase等）

熟悉非关系型数据库

有容器化部署和运维经验

熟悉前端Next.js框架

有RAG或者Agent项目开发经验

使用 Node.js 构建高性能、可扩展的前后端服务

负责 Web 前端（React）开发，确保良好的用户体验与性能 （偏向后端，前端有一定了解和项目经验即可）

优化现有系统性能与架构，参与技术选型与架构设计

基础要求：

Node.js（Express等框架）

熟练掌握 JavaScript / TypeScript，理解异步编程、事件循环等机制

RESTful API / GraphQL 开发经验

WebSocket / SSE 实时通信开发

基础SQL数据库操作（Postgres优先）

加分项：

熟悉消息队列、缓存等中间件的应用与开发

熟悉云服务和serverless开发（AWS，Vercel，Supabase等）

熟悉非关系型数据库

有容器化部署和运维经验

熟悉前端Next.js框架

有RAG或者Agent项目开发经验

Title: Sr. Associate Director, Software Engineering Specialist
Description:
Some careers have more impact than others.

If you’re looking for a career where you can make a real impression, join HSBC and discover how valued you’ll be.




We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of Sr. Associate Director, Software Engineering Specialist.




Business: CTO Infrastructure




Principal responsibilities

Lead the operations and maintenance of the Abacus-specific IKP platform and its ecosystem components.
Ensure the platform's high availability, elasticity, and redundancy to support critical banking services.
Collaborating with the global IKP team for support and knowledge sharing.
Providing 24/7 on-call first-line support for the IKP platform.
Delivering DevOps hyper care support tailored to the Abacus project.
Act as the primary point of contact for user communication, addressing platform-related inquiries and issues.
Represent the team during regulatory inspections and audits, ensuring compliance with all requirements.
Coordinate with vendors to resolve platform-related issues and ensure service quality.
Drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance platform reliability, performance, and operational efficiency.
Develop and implement best practices for platform management, incident response, and team operations.




Qualifications - External

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
Proven experience in Kubernetes platform operations, including deployment, scaling, and troubleshooting.
Strong understanding of containerization technologies and cloud-native architectures, with experience in managing 24/7 operations teams and handling mission-critical systems and excellent communication skills to interact with users, regulators, and vendors effectively, and Experience in the banking or financial services industry.
Strong leadership and problem-solving skills, with the ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.
Familiarity with DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure automation.
Knowledge of regulatory compliance requirements for IT systems.
Certification in Kubernetes (CKA/CKAD) or related technologies.
Experience in managing vendor relationships and contracts.




Candidate with less relevant experience or skills may be offered a lower Global Career Band than stated above.




About HSBC Technology China

We develop, implement and support software and IT services and processes that allow HSBC to remain at the forefront of high-quality banking systems.




You’ll achieve more when you join HSBC.




HSBC is an equal opportunity employer committed to building a culture where all employees are valued, respected and opinions count. We take pride in providing a workplace that fosters continuous professional development, flexible working and, opportunities to grow within an inclusive and diverse environment. We encourage applications from all suitably qualified persons irrespective of, but not limited to, their gender or genetic information, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, social status, medical care leave requirements, political affiliation, people with disabilities, color, national origin, veteran status, etc., We consider all applications based on merit and suitability to the role.




Personal data held by the Bank relating to employment applications will be used in accordance with our Privacy Statement, which is available on our website.







***Issued By HSBC Software Development (GuangDong) Limited***

Title: 图像软件开发工程师（LZ）-伽马影像组（校招）
Company: 广东粤港澳大湾区协同创新研究院
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 职责描述: 2025届应届生 1、核医学影像设备（伽马相机、SPECT）的图像算法集成与显示； 2、医学图像处理功能开发与交互显示，例如图像变换、增强、分割、配准、去噪、测量等； 3、基于医学图像的临床信息提取与交互显示； 4、图像软件的设计-开发-测试-故障解决-功能扩展优化过程； 5、配合系统调测试、其他技术功能模块的接口、调测试等技术支持； 6、根据软件开发流程规范与医疗器械相关法规，编制相关需求、设计、测试文档。 任职要求: 2025届应届生 1、理工科专业硕士，信息科学（如电子，自动化、计算机）、生物医学工程、核工程技术等专业优先； 2、修习过计算机软硬件、信号处理、图像处理相关课程； 3、至少熟练使用一种计算机语言并且有良好的新平台、新语言学习能力。有图像软件实际项目开发经验优先； 4、诚信、认真、负责、积极主动，逻辑清晰，有良好的沟通能力和团队合作意识。 5、英文水平良好，能够阅读和理解英文技术文档。

Title: 现场技术支持工程师-佛山(J10363)
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 工作职责: 1、技术支持工作：产品推广，客户产品售前、交付、售后； 2、产品信息收集：问题、需求收集； 3、市场信息收集：行业信息，客户信息等； 4、适应长期的出差（7-20天/月）。 任职资格: 1、本科学历，电气、机械、自动化等相关专业优先； 2、熟悉自控原理、三维绘图软件等优先； 3、良好的学习能力、沟通能力、抗压能力，亲和有耐心，有较好的奋斗意识。 【岗位定位】 超级信息中转站、行走的CPU，价值需求挖掘、推动内部产品优化 【发展方向】 1.专家线，区域内的问题解决专家，业务内的技术代表； 2.管理线，区域经理方向； 3.横向 产品经理/客户经理等方向 【成长护航】定制导师，通用&专业双线培训计划 【薪酬福利】

14~20w/年，有住房补贴 ；

六险二金，带薪假期，春节假期14天起~

Title: 认证工程师
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 职责描述： 1、负责法规标准的解读，及时通报标准最新要求； 2、审核产品设计资料，参与产品安规设计及评审； 3、根据对应市场评估认证方案，制定认证计划并落实，确保按期取得认证证书； 4、负责产品全生命周期的认证风险识别及控制，处理产品销售过程中出现的认证问题； 5、定期组织公司内部认证，标准等培训活动； 6、领导安排的相关工作。 任职要求： 1、本科以上工科背景，电子相关专业优先。 2、3年以上家电类产品认证工作经验，熟悉欧美、日韩等安规、EMC、能效等认证要求。 3、深入理解产品认证相关的国际标准、规范，确保项目设计、开发、实施、测试、运维等各个环节都遵循这些国际公认的要求。 4、熟悉产品/项目涉及国家/地区的相关法律法规、行业规定和环境要求（如网络安全、行业安全标准、环保法规等）。 5、熟练掌握家电类国内外安规标准等，有扫地机器人类产品相关认证经验优先。 6、英语良好，能熟练阅读各种英文资料，过四级以上。 7、具有良好的团队合作精神，良好的沟通协调能力，较强的责任心以及抗压能力。

Title: 数字后端设计工程师
Company: 上海遇贤商务咨询有限公司
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 我们是一家专注于半导体领域的创新型企业，致力于为全球客户提供先进的芯片解决方案。公司成立以来，凭借坚实的技术实力和创新精神，在行业内迅速崛起，取得了一系列突破性成果。目前，我们正处于高速发展阶段，业务范围不断拓展，对优秀人才的需求也日益增长。为满足公司业务发展需要，现面向应届毕业生招聘数字后端设计工程师，欢迎有志之士加入我们的团队，与公司共同成长，共创辉煌未来。

岗位职责：

在导师指导下，参与芯片数字后端从 RTL 到 GDS 的设计流程，包括布局规划（Floorplan）、电源规划（PowerPlan）、布局布线（Place & Route）等工作。

协助进行静态时序分析（STA）、功耗分析、电压降分析（IR Drop）等，确保设计满足时序和功耗要求。

学习并运用相关 EDA 工具，如 Innovus、ICC2、DC 等，完成日常设计任务。

参与物理验证工作，包括设计规则检查（DRC）、版图与原理图一致性检查（LVS）等，保障设计的正确性。

与前端设计团队、验证团队及其他相关部门密切沟通协作，及时解决设计过程中出现的问题。

任职要求：

2025 届本科及以上学历应届毕业生，微电子、集成电路、电子工程、通信工程等相关专业。

熟悉数字电路基础知识，了解数字后端设计流程者优先。

具备良好的学习能力和自我驱动力，对芯片设计行业充满热情，愿意在该领域深入发展。

熟练掌握 C/C++、Python、Perl 等至少一种编程语言或脚本语言。

具备良好的沟通能力和团队协作精神，能够积极主动地与团队成员合作完成项目任务。

英语读写能力良好，能够阅读英文技术文档。

福利待遇：

具有竞争力的薪资待遇和年终奖金，为你的努力和贡献提供丰厚回报。

完善的五险一金，全方位保障你的生活和健康。

提供系统的入职培训和在职培训，帮助你快速成长为行业专家。公司内部设有专业的导师团队，助力你顺利融入工作环境，提升专业技能。

丰富的员工福利，让你感受到家的温暖。

广阔的职业发展空间，公司注重员工的职业发展规划，为表现优秀的员工提供晋升机会和跨部门轮岗机会，帮助你实现个人职业目标。

舒适的工作环境和活跃的团队氛围，定期组织团队建设活动，增进团队凝聚力，让你在轻松愉快的氛围中工作。
Show more

丰富的员工福利，让你感受到家的温暖。

广阔的职业发展空间，公司注重员工的职业发展规划，为表现优秀的员工提供晋升机会和跨部门轮岗机会，帮助你实现个人职业目标。

舒适的工作环境和活跃的团队氛围，定期组织团队建设活动，增进团队凝聚力，让你在轻松愉快的氛围中工作。

Title: Senior Data Engineer(MainApp)
Description:
Responsibilities

Build a universal data platform, meet real-time/offline computing and storage requirements;
Define the data pipeline scheme according to the demand scenarios, and deliver it by multiple methods based on various infrastructure;
Enhance the data platform, improve the stability and flexibility of data asset, and optimize the resource efficiency





Requirements
Bachelor degree or above, major in computer, big data, mathematics, and more than 5 years of data development experience;
Familiar with Hadoop, Spark, Flink, Airflow and other popular data platform components, understand the working principle of them, and have optimization experience about these components;
Have a certain understanding of distributed system principles, calculations, and storage;
Good communication and logical thinking skills, good self-drive, continuous learning and updating knowledge system;








Life @ Crypto.com

 

Empowered to think big. Try new opportunities while working with a talented, ambitious and supportive team.

Transformational and proactive working environment. Elevate employees to find thoughtful and innovative solutions.

Growth from within. We help to develop new skill-sets that would impact the shaping of your personal and professional growth.

Work Culture. Our colleagues are some of the best in the industry; we are all here to help and support one another.

One cohesive team. Engage stakeholders to achieve our ultimate goal - Cryptocurrency in every wallet. 

 

 

Are you ready to kickstart your future with us? 

 

Benefits

 

Competitive salary 

Medical insurance package with extended coverage to dependents 

Attractive annual leave entitlement including: birthday, work anniversary

Work Flexibility Adoption. Flexi-work hour and hybrid or remote set-up

Aspire career alternatives through us. Our internal mobility program can offer employees a diverse scope.  

Work Perks: crypto.com visa card provided upon joining

Founded in 2016, Crypto.com serves more than 80 million customers and is the world's fastest growing global cryptocurrency platform. Our vision is simple: Cryptocurrency in Every Wallet™. Title: Platform Engineer
Description:
Job Summary

As a DevOps Platform Engineer, you will play a critical role in the design, development, and deployment of our platform infrastructure. You will work collaboratively with a cross-functional team, focusing on CI/CD pipelines, cloud and on-prem platform setup, and infrastructure as code (IaC) management. Your expertise will be pivotal in ensuring the scalability, reliability, and efficiency of our platform solutions.

Responsibilities

Business


Develop and champion solutions through coding and automation
Ensure platform delivery and services meet highest level of standard of availability and reliability.
Manage the DevOps tools deployed on-prem and on Kubernetes
Review the current DevOps pipeline and provide implement a short and long term plan.
Experience in building pipeline for hybrid cloud solutions
Onboard development team into the DevOps pipeline.
Expertise in Config and Development tools experience.
Knowledge in DevOps tool chain.
Define the application monitoring, alerting and reporting framework.
Collaborate with the solution architects and application development leads to co-create robust and scalable application framework by providing best practices in design & coding.


Key Responsibilities

Regulatory & Business Conduct


Display exemplary conduct and live by the Group’s Values and Code of Conduct.
Take personal responsibility for embedding the highest standards of ethics, including regulatory and business conduct, across Standard Chartered Bank. This includes understanding and ensuring compliance with, in letter and spirit, all applicable laws, regulations, guidelines and the Group Code of Conduct.
Effectively and collaboratively identify, escalate, mitigate and resolve risk, conduct and compliance matters.


Key stakeholders


Software Engineering Teams
Platform Teams
Product Owner
Engineers
CISRO, CISO


Other Responsibilities

Embed Here for good and Group’s brand and values in XXXX [country / business unit / team]; Perform other responsibilities assigned under Group, Country, Business or Functional policies and procedures; Multiple functions (double hats); [List all responsibilities associated with the role]

Skills And Experience

Cloud Computing

Cloud Computing Architecture

Agile Development

Emerging Technologies

Kafka

Continuous Integration

Qualifications


Microservices Architecture: Proficient in designing and managing microservices, with experience in Apache Kafka.
Cloud Computing: Hands-on experience with AWS, Azure, and EKS.
Container Technologies: Extensive experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes.
Programming and Scripting: Strong skills in Python, with additional proficiency in Ansible and Groovy being advantageous.
Infrastructure Knowledge: Solid understanding of networks, operating systems, and other infrastructure components.
Configuration Management: Experience with tools like Ansible and Packer for managing configurations.
Continuous Integration: Proficient in using tools like Maven and Jenkins for CI processes.
Continuous Deployment: Experience with deployment tools such as Jenkins and Rundeck.
Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication abilities.


About Standard Chartered

We're an international bank, nimble enough to act, big enough for impact. For more than 170 years, we've worked to make a positive difference for our clients, communities, and each other. We question the status quo, love a challenge and enjoy finding new opportunities to grow and do better than before. If you're looking for a career with purpose and you want to work for a bank making a difference, we want to hear from you. You can count on us to celebrate your unique talents and we can't wait to see the talents you can bring us.

Our purpose, to drive commerce and prosperity through our unique diversity, together with our brand promise, to be here for good are achieved by how we each live our valued behaviours. When you work with us, you'll see how we value difference and advocate inclusion.

Together We


Do the right thing and are assertive, challenge one another, and live with integrity, while putting the client at the heart of what we do
Never settle, continuously striving to improve and innovate, keeping things simple and learning from doing well, and not so well
Are better together, we can be ourselves, be inclusive, see more good in others, and work collectively to build for the long term


What We Offer

In line with our Fair Pay Charter, we offer a competitive salary and benefits to support your mental, physical, financial and social wellbeing.


Core bank funding for retirement savings, medical and life insurance, with flexible and voluntary benefits available in some locations.
Time-off including annual leave, parental/maternity (20 weeks), sabbatical (12 months maximum) and volunteering leave (3 days), along with minimum global standards for annual and public holiday, which is combined to 30 days minimum.
Flexible working options based around home and office locations, with flexible working patterns.
Proactive wellbeing support through Unmind, a market-leading digital wellbeing platform, development courses for resilience and other human skills, global Employee Assistance Programme, sick leave, mental health first-aiders and all sorts of self-help toolkits
A continuous learning culture to support your growth, with opportunities to reskill and upskill and access to physical, virtual and digital learning.
Being part of an inclusive and values driven organisation, one that embraces and celebrates our unique diversity, across our teams, business functions and geographies - everyone feels respected and can realise their full potential.

Title: Mid/Senior FullStack Engineer - Blockchain Innovation
Description:
Overview:




At Crypto.com, our Blockchain Innovation Team is at the heart of driving innovative advancements within the Blockchain Team. As a dynamic, multidisciplinary team scattered across various locations, we pride ourselves on our flexibility and our commitment to product excellence. Our projects span a wide range, from developing cutting-edge websites and backend applications to crafting APIs, engaging Discord bots, and interactive Web3 and GamiFi demos. By joining us, you'll be part of a forward-thinking team that's constantly exploring new horizons in blockchain technology and beyond.




We're seeking a Full Stack Engineer with a deep understanding of Node.js, React, and Web3 technologies to become an integral part of our Blockchain Innovation Team. In this role, you'll contribute to a variety of projects, ensuring both innovation and quality. Whether it's developing sophisticated web applications, integrating blockchain functionalities, or working on interactive demos, your work will have a significant impact on our mission to accelerate the world's transition to cryptocurrency.




Role Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain diverse projects ranging from web applications to backend services, APIs, Discord bots, and Unity demos
Implement Web3 functionalities, smart contract interactions, and wallet integrations using technologies such as Web3.js, ethers.js, and MetaMask
Work closely with team members across different locations, adapting to the dynamic needs of each project while striving for excellence
Engage with the latest blockchain technologies, keeping the team at the forefront of the industry's evolution
Contribute to all phases of the development lifecycle, ensuring high performance, responsiveness, and a stellar user experience across all our products and platforms
Work with TypeScript and Redux for predictable state management across the applications
(Optional) Leverage knowledge in Unity, Golang, and Rust to contribute to innovative projects that require cross-platform and high-performance computing capabilities





Required Skills and Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent practical experience
Proven track record as a Full Stack Engineer with a strong portfolio showcasing your work in Node.js and React.
Solid experience with Web3 technologies, including Web3.js, ethers.js, MetaMask, and wallet integration
Proficiency in TypeScript and Redux, with a strong understanding of modern JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3
Familiarity with code versioning tools, such as Git, and front-end build pipelines and tools
Experience with RESTful services and APIs
Understanding of both SQL and NoSQL database technologies
Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to work independently or as part of a team
Strong communication skills, capable of explaining complex concepts to non-technical stakeholders
Knowledge of Unity, Golang, and Rust is highly regarded but not essential
Fluency in English communication and experience in global environment








Life @ Crypto.com

 

Empowered to think big. Try new opportunities while working with a talented, ambitious and supportive team.

Transformational and proactive working environment. Elevate employees to find thoughtful and innovative solutions.

Growth from within. We help to develop new skill-sets that would impact the shaping of your personal and professional growth.

Work Culture. Our colleagues are some of the best in the industry; we are all here to help and support one another.

One cohesive team. Engage stakeholders to achieve our ultimate goal - Cryptocurrency in every wallet. 

 

 

Are you ready to kickstart your future with us? 

 

Benefits

 

Competitive salary 

Medical insurance package with extended coverage to dependents 

Attractive annual leave entitlement including: birthday, work anniversary

Work Flexibility Adoption. Flexi-work hour and hybrid or remote set-up

Aspire career alternatives through us. Our internal mobility program can offer employees a diverse scope.  

Work Perks: crypto.com visa card provided upon joining 

 

Our Crypto.com benefits packages vary depending on region requirements, you can learn more from our talent acquisition team.

 

About Crypto.com:

 

Founded in 2016, Crypto.com serves more than 80 million customers and is the world's fastest growing global cryptocurrency platform. Our vision is simple: Cryptocurrency in Every Wallet™. Built on a foundation of security, privacy, and compliance, Crypto.com is committed to accelerating the adoption of cryptocurrency through innovation and empowering the next generation of builders, creators, and entrepreneurs to develop a fairer and more equitable digital ecosystem.

 

Learn more at https://crypto.com. 

 

Crypto.com is an equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating an environment where opportunities are presented to everyone in a fair and transparent way. Crypto.com values diversity and inclusion, seeking candidates with a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills that complement and strengthen our team.

 

Personal data provided by applicants will be used for recruitment purposes only.

Title: Engineer, Software Development
Description:
**Job Title: Wireline Data Path Engineer**


Job Summary:**



We are seeking a skilled and experienced Wireline Data Link Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining wireline data link systems. This role requires a deep understanding of wireline communication technologies, protocols, and industry standards.


Key Responsibilities:**
Design and develop wireline data link systems and components.
Perform system integration, testing, and validation of wireline communication systems.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to wireline data link performance and reliability.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of wireline systems with other network components.
Develop and maintain technical documentation, including design specifications, test plans, and user manuals.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in wireline communication technologies and industry standards.
Qualifications:**
Bachelor's degree or higher in Communications Engineering, Computer Science and Technology, Electrical Engineering, or a related field. Fresh graduates in Year 2 or Year 3 Master program are also welcomed to apply.
Good to have experience in wireline communication systems engineering.
Good to have experience in C/C++ language development on Linux platform
Strong knowledge of wireline communication protocols and standards (e.g., 802.3, TCP/IP, L2TP, L2VPN, DOCSIS).
Proficiency in using simulation and testing tools for wireline systems(e.g., IPerf, ByteBlower, Wireshark, TShark).
Excellent problem-solving skills, clear logic, and attention to detail.
Strong communication and teamwork skills.
Preferred Qualifications:**
Experience in developing data link modules under vCCAP/rCCAP platforms.
Excellent English communication skills, CET6 preferred.

Title: (Senior) Java Developer - MainApp/Rewards
HTML:
We are a team to design, develop, maintain, and improve software for various ventures projects, i.e., projects that are adjacent to our core businesses and are bootstrapped fast with a lean team. You will be actively involved in the design of various components behind scalable applications, from frontend UI to backend infrastructure.


Job Responsibilities
  • Responsible for backend system development, making architectural decisions, and participating in the design process;
  • Involved in code review, testing, and release work;
  • Establish a fast and deployable system with automated testing, continuous integration, and easy delivery;
  • Identify issues and implement solutions on backend infrastructure and platforms;
  • Analyze and solve problems across the technology stack;
  • Work closely with the security team to build and operate a highly secure, scalable infrastructure and backend services;
  • Manage all code and functional implementation documentation;
  • Collaborate closely with the DevOps team to continuously enhance and improve the technology stack


Job Requirement
  • Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or a related field
  • More than 5 years of work experience with extensive experience in system design and development, capable of independently completing requirement analysis, system design, code development, providing application solutions, and continuously optimizing product quality and system performance;
  • Solid foundation in Java programming, familiar with JVM including memory model, class loading mechanism, and performance optimization, and understanding of Java concurrent programming;
  • Familiar with mainstream development frameworks, proficient in using Spring, Spring Boot for development, mastery of common design patterns, and practical application experience;
  • Proficient in middleware such as RabbitMQ, Kafka, Redis, and databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, with an understanding of their principles;
  • Good coding habits with a self-requirement for unit test coverage;
  • High sense of responsibility, strong adaptability and self-learning ability, good communication and collaboration skills, able to independently analyze and solve problems;
  • Sensitive to new technologies, with a strong desire to learn, and capable of quickly learning and understanding new technologies;
  • Good communication and expression skills, teamwork skills, and self-drive;
  • Experience in developing large-scale trading systems or operational systems is preferred



Life @ Crypto.com


Empowered to think big. Try new opportunities while working with a talented, ambitious and supportive team.

Transformational and proactive working environment. Empower employees to find thoughtful and innovative solutions.

Growth from within. We help to develop new skill-sets that would impact the shaping of your personal and professional growth.

Work Culture. Our colleagues are some of the best in the industry; we are all here to help and support one another.

One cohesive team. Engage stakeholders to achieve our ultimate goal - Cryptocurrency in every wallet.

Work Flexibility Adoption. Flexi-work hour and hybrid or remote set-up

Aspire career alternatives through us - our internal mobility program offers employees a new scope.

Work Perks: crypto.com visa card provided upon joining


Are you ready to kickstart your future with us?


Benefits


Competitive salary

Attractive annual leave entitlement including: birthday, work anniversary

Work Flexibility Adoption. Flexi-work hour and hybrid or remote set-up

Aspire career alternatives through us. Our internal mobility program can offer employees a diverse scope.

Work Perks: crypto.com visa card provided upon joining


Our Crypto.com benefits packages vary depending on region requirements, you can learn more from our talent acquisition team.



About Crypto.com:


Founded in 2016, Crypto.com serves more than 80 million customers and is the world's fastest growing global cryptocurrency platform. Our vision is simple: Cryptocurrency in Every Wallet™. Built on a foundation of security, privacy, and compliance, Crypto.com is committed to accelerating the adoption of cryptocurrency through innovation and empowering the next generation of builders, creators, and entrepreneurs to develop a fairer and more equitable digital ecosystem.


Learn more at https://crypto.com.


Crypto.com is an equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating an environment where opportunities are presented to everyone in a fair and transparent way. Crypto.com values diversity and inclusion, seeking candidates with a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills that complement and strengthen our team.


Personal data provided by applicants will be used for recruitment purposes only.


Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Title: 助理硬件工程师
Company: 上海遇贤商务咨询有限公司
Description:
该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责：

以下按偏硬/偏软方向招募，具体岗位可在入职后考察确定。 硬件设计方向： 电路设计 - 原理图设计，硬件调试，元器件选型及库文件建立。 封装设计 - 封装基板layout，芯片ballmap分析，协助SIPI仿真。 硬件测试及自动化开发： 芯片及电路硬件功能测试，芯片问题定位及分析，芯片及电路测试自动化程序开发。 任职要求： 硬件设计方向：熟悉数字电路、模拟电路，曾参与或主导完成电路设计及其调试，对电源完整性/信号完整性设计有了解更佳。 硬件测试及自动化开发：熟悉编程（C，Python或类似编程语言），熟悉常见电路接口（例如UART，I2C等），熟悉数字电路/模拟电路更佳。

Title: Senior Mobile Developer (React Native) - Onchain Wallet
Description:
We are a team to design, develop, maintain, and improve software for various ventures projects, i.e., projects that are adjacent to our core businesses and are bootstrapped fast with a lean team. You will be actively involved in the design of various components behind scalable applications, from frontend UI to backend infrastructure.




The Onchain team is dedicated to delivering a secure and user-friendly multi-chain digital currency wallet. It enables users to unlock the full potential of their crypto assets while providing seamless access to DeFi, dApps, and trading functionalities—all in one platform.




The difference you will make:
Collaborate closely with members of tech & product in a cross-functional feature team to develop innovative features for a large global user base
Analyse product requirements and designs provided by product owners, providing valuable feedback based on your expertise in mobile development
Deliver high-quality, modularised, and scalable code that is maintainable and testable within reasonable timelines
Engage in regular sync-ups with not only your feature team, but also the entire mobile development team, ensuring that your ideas and insights are heard and valued





Your expertise:
Minimum of 2 years of full-time React Native development experience (no upper limit)
Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and React Native framework
**Native development experience with iOS (Swift) and/or Android (Kotlin) is highly valued**
Understanding of native modules and the ability to bridge between React Native and native code
Experience in writing unit tests and E2E tests
Proficiency in Git and familiarity with branching models such as Git-flow, Trunk Based Development, etc
Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for continuous learning
Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
A focus on producing high-quality code and exceptional user experiences



If you are a motivated and talented React Native developer who thrives in a collaborative environment and has experience with native mobile development, we would love to hear from you.Join our team and contribute to building cutting-edge mobile applications that make a difference.Please include examples of your work or links to your portfolio with your application.
